conversations.name: Michael Chen
conversations.message: Hey team, let's start by reviewing the Q4 financials. I've uploaded the key document.

conversations.message: Thanks, Michael. I’ve shared a file for reference.

conversations.message: Looks good. Can we discuss the revenue dip in November?

conversations.message: Sure, Samuel. Let’s dive into the details.
